Santos.line: Hilda, mate! Tell Tom he ain't eating with the others tonight!
Listen, I just caught him slacking off down at the dining hall. Talked smack to me, too. He needs to learn his lesson.

Hilda.line: Are you sure you want to do that? He's only 17, Santos.

Santos.line: Hilda, mate! Tell Tom he ain't eating with the others tonight!

Hilda.line: He's my SON, Hilda! I can't let him off doing whatever he pleases! Do you want him to grow up and become a weakling?

Santos.line: Alright, fine. I'll talk to him. But if he insists on saying no, I'm not going to force him. Deal?
